comprehensive_overview: Poppler is a software utility library that is used to render PDF documents. It is a PDF rendering library based on the xpdf-3.0 code base. It provides various command-line utilities for working with PDF files as well.
core_features:
1. Rendering PDF documents
2. Parsing PDF files
3. Extracting text and images from PDFs
4. Converting PDF to other formats
5. Command-line utilities for PDF manipulation
